ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Quest] EQ bugs
ygData.msgSnippet: Umm, this is not a cheats list. Sorry you have been misinformed. Mu ... From: andreas.mangs@tietoenator.com [mailto:andreas.mangs@tietoenator.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Umm, this is not a cheats list. Sorry you have been misinformed.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: andreas.mangs@...
[mailto:andreas.mangs@...]
Sent: Friday, January 26, 2001 7:43 AM
To: EQ-Quest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] EQ bugs


This is a cheats list so his question is not wrong and doesn't call for
sarcasm.

I don't know any cheats. Fastest way to level is to make a necro and solo in
the
right places. Even faster is it to buy an account from someone that has a
lvl
50+ char
